fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Give someone a can of food.
- Open someone's can of food for them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player with a closed can of food may choose to spend their night opening it themself.
- Your second ability is a day ability, but it takes affect at the end of the night, and you cannot give anyone a can of food that night. Your target will know you are opening their canned food for them.
- A player with an opened can of food may choose to consume it at any time, irrespective of whether or not they use their ability, to heal themself.
- A player may have multiple cans.
- You may only give yourself one can, ever. It will automatically be open.
